ActPay Equity Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pay Equity Regulations (Administrative Monetary Penalties and Technical Amendments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PAY EQUITY REGULATIONS (ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES AND TECHNICAL AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) establish a process for updating pay equity plans in workplaces with no predominantly male job classes; (2) revise the rules for calculating the hourly rates of pay for a “typical job class”; (3) require additional information in the annual statement to better determine the impact of the pay equity regime on the gender wage gap; (4) amend the posting deadline for a group of employers to post their notice of obligations; and (5) establish an administrative monetary penalties system to designate violations and penalty ranges.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0101 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
